code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var languages=[{code:'EN',locale:'en-US',direction:'ltr'},{code:'ES',locale:'es-ES',direction:'ltr'},{code:'DE',locale:'de-DE',direction:'ltr'}];var navigatorLang=navigator.languages&&navigator.languages[0]||navigator.language||navigator.userLanguage;var findOrDefault=function findOrDefault(key){return languages.find(function(x){return x.locale===key||x.code===key;})||languages[0];};var initialState={languages:languages,currentLang:findOrDefault(navigatorLang)};var langSlice=createSlice({name:'lang',initialState:initialState,reducers:{changeLang:function changeLang(state,action){state.currentLang=findOrDefault(action.payload);}}});var changeLang=langSlice.actions.changeLang;export{changeLang};var langReducer=langSlice.reducer;export default langReducer;
